fields.name: Remedy Studies (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to bleeding.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Exhume (Day, 3 Uses):
fields.value:
At the end of the night, learn what ~~classes~~ roles killed a player, or if they committed suicide. Can not be cancelled once used.
- Triggers at the end of the night.

fields.name: Inoculate (Day, 1 Use):
fields.value:
Make a player permanently immune to bleeding. They will not be notified you targeted them. They will keep this passive even if their ~~class~~ role changes.
- Does not heal bleeding.

fields.name: Heal (Night):
fields.value:
Use your staff to Heal target player, ~~preventing their death~~ granting Powerful Defense and curing any bleeding.
- Does not affect unhealable attacks.

fields.name: Self-Care (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value:
If you are attacked tonight, you will heal yourself.
- Does not affect unhealable attacks.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Exhume reveals cause of death if it was hidden or falsified. Is Town Protective.
